author: Ash Webb
comment: Compared to most wear faces (and I've bought a lot and tried a lot of free ones)  this thing just sips on the battery. Dev, need steps please? Oh and I've just donated, it's worth it
title: Impressive battery life

author: Paul Turner
comment: Umm, something is not working, the app doesn't show up on the watch...and there is no tutorial or how to guide. Restarted the phone and the watch....any suggestions??? Update: response of Dev team is outstanding, as soon as the problem is fixed will give 5 stars...
title: CWF

comment: Simple yet effective.  Wish there was more customization but all in all a well rounded app
title: Great

author: Andy Williams
comment: Not the kind of watch face I'd usually go for but love this one.
title: Unusual

author: MacSeoin #1
comment: Doesn't appear in wear app or on my Sony smart watch 3

comment: some more settings? .. date format.. and maybe size.. ie lower numbers are off bottom slightly in moto 360..and time out :-)
title: cool watch...

author: Shayne
comment: Note4 and samsung gear live.
title: Works fantastic

author: Nelson Lam
comment: Was great til it stopped showing phone battery.
title: Little buggy

author: Akash Murthy
comment: Got to praise the dev for battery life and design!
title: My current watch face!

author: ziyi zhang
comment: I like simple and useful watch faces! Just like this one and watch face of ben

author: Marp
comment: Thought it was pretty cool but no option for 12 hour mode
title: No 12 hour option

author: Mohd Hafez
comment: Smart to display as wallpaper lock screen.i like
title: Awesome

author: סול פיג'ון
comment: Very nice concept

author: James Lee
comment: Great looking. Informative. Couldn't have asked for more in a free app. Update: After the recent rounds of updates almost every other watch face apps I use failed to update the dimmed time consistently except this Chrono app! Made a donation gratefully.
title: My absolute favorite!

author: Gerald Cox
comment: Really nice.  Especially like that this watch is 24 Hour aware;  big plus.    Would be great if you could allow changing the date order, i.e. from Month Day, to Day Month... but that is a nit.
title: Simple, innovative design

author: Jim Mussared
comment: Simple but very nicely done. No battery life issues either.
title: Favourite watch face

author: Rich
comment: Outstanding job designing this watch face. Very functional and good looking. My favorite.
title: Great Watch Face

author: Mark P
comment: Simple and easy to read,looks sweet on my Sony smartwatch 3
title: Smart watch face

author: Michael Wheeler
comment: Best watch face and great update, well done
title: Awesome

author: Sander Keunen
comment: I always keep coming back to this one
title: Very nice

author: Сергей Ковалевич
comment: Nice! Looks very good on smartwatch3

author: Rayyan Fairaq
comment: This watch face is designed for square watches. The battery meters are in the two bottom corners, so they're not visible on my Moto 360. I'd also like to have more options to choose colors. I wanted to choose the same color for two items and I couldn't choose the exact same color for both using the color wheel. Otherwise, the design is very nice, and I appreciate that it's available for free!
title: Needs to support circular watches

author: Paul Buonopane
comment: Love where this is going! Only problem is that my notifications often block the time. Think you could work your genius to solve this? I can disable the card preview when in dimmed mode, but then I have to glance at my watch at weird angles. Donated--keep up the great work!
title: Awesome

author: Michael Beattie
comment: Only 4 stars as notification toast takes up half the screen on my Sony SW3.  {EDIT} Dropping to 2 stars, as time has stopped updating when screen is dimmed. Have to wake screen to update, so defeats the purpose really.
title: Great, simple watch face

author: Ancient Infant
comment: Only thing that's missing is the temperature. I'm digging on the simple and practical, yet elegant approach. Add the temp and I don't see a reason to use another face.
title: Best face yet!

author: Dan Bush
comment: I want to use this as my main watch face, but the face has several shortcomings on watches such as the Moto 360, and one shortcoming on all watches.  The biggest issue is that when a card is showing up, and its between 4 and 8 o'clock the card covers up the time. Why not also have the time show up in the center? Also, on a round screen the battery indicators are off-screen completely, and the watch face as a whole just feels... a little over sized compared to the device.  There needs to be more padding around the face (this would also help fix the off-screen battery indicators). Finally, and this is just a minor thing, I really feel like the typography of the watchface could be improved to be more usable at a glance.  The idea behind this watchface is phenomenal, but the execution is lacking. I look forward to coming back to this the next time it is updated.
title: Fantastic Ideas, Lacks Round Screen Optimization.

author: CIDTV
comment: Can You Put the Weather On This Face, It would be a perfect watch face then and I'm sure I'm not the only want who doesn't want that feature!!!!
title: There's Just one thing missing for 5 stars

author: Daniel Corral
comment: Best watch face out right now only thing I wish the app could do is display the date while it is dimmed. Other than that it is an amazing watch face, best on the play store.
title: Beautiful watch face

author: Liviu Popa
comment: It is my current choice and it will stay like that if there will be also a minimalistic weather info (a small icon + temperature). I'll offer 5 stars for being one of the best looking watch faces out there, in all its simplicity.
title: Superb watch face

author: David D. Stanton
comment: Day/month no longer shows on new wear version.
title: Wear 5.0.1 problem

author: Jeremy Arey
comment: This is a truly original take on what a smart watch face should be. This is all I use and I love the ability to change colors. It would be nice to change the BG color as well but 5 stars from me. Great job! I will be donating.
title: What a watch face should be

author: Chris Maloney
comment: On my LG watch r it does not show the date, nor do I see an option to turn that feature on.  If I could get that working this would be a great face.
title: Where's the date

author: Rushi Ravisaheb
comment: On my G Watch, I like this very much, as this watch has almost everything. I'd like more customization such as weather at times.
title: One of the best out here for free !!

author: Patrick Baur
comment: Donated right away without any hesitation. Beautiful, appealing watch face, the combination of digital and analog into one (without retreating to dual display) is genius!
title: Splendid watch

author: William Davison
comment: My personal favourite watch face, its great because it give me my phone battery as well as my watch. Super app. Square smart watches are the new round watches.
title: Great app

author: Mark Ivanowich
comment: This is my main watch face. I love the colours, and the battery percentages in the corner are essential. Awesome!
title: Perfect for Gear Live

author: Emmanuel Otchere
comment: Few recommendations - like why not put AM/PM within the clock face? Or provide added information within the clock?
title: Good start.

author: Robert Turnbull
comment: No date on lg g watch r 5.0.1
title: 5 stars of date comes back

author: thompsonn19
comment: It's simple yet tells everything except the temp...love that it has the watch AND phone battery % on it
title: Love it

comment: My LG G watch R needs this
title: No round support
